```{mermaid}
erDiagram
  STATION_INFORMATION }|--o{ STATION_STATUS : "has status"

  STATION_INFORMATION {
    int64 station_id "maps to station_status station_id"
    int64 short_name "maps to trip_data start_station_id, end_station_id"
    object name
    float64 lon
    float64 lat
    int64 region_id "maps to system_regions region_id"
    int64 capacity
    bool has_kiosk
    bool has_key_dispenser
    int64 last_updated
    int64 ttl
    datetime scrape_time
    object station_services_name "optional"
    float64 station_services_description "optional"
    object station_services_bikes_availability "optional"
    object station_services_docks_availability "optional"
    float64 station_services_off_dock_remaining_bike_capacity "optional"
    float64 station_services_off_dock_bikes_count "optional"
    float64 station_services_schedule_description "optional"
  }

  STATION_STATUS {
    int64 station_id "maps to station_information station_id"
    int64 num_bikes_available
    int64 num_docks_available
    int64 num_bikes_disabled
    int64 num_docks_disabled
    int64 num_ebikes_available
    bool has_available_keys
    bool is_installed
    bool is_returning
    bool is_renting
    int64 last_updated
    int64 last_reported
    int64 ttl
    datetime scrape_time
    object station_status "optional"
    bool valet_active "optional"
    float64 valet_dock_blocked_count "optional"
    float64 valet_valet_revision "optional"
    float64 valet_off_dock_capacity "optional"
    float64 valet_off_dock_count "optional"
  }

  FREE_BIKE_STATUS {
    object bike_id
    float64 lat
    float64 lon
    bool is_reserved
    bool is_disabled
    int64 last_updated
    int64 ttl
    datetime scrape_time
  }

  TRIP_DATA {
    datetime started_at
    datetime ended_at
    int64 start_station_id "maps to station_information short_name"
    int64 end_station_id "maps to station_information short_name"
    bool member_casual
    object bike_number "optional"
    object ride_id "optional"
    int64 rideable_type "optional"
  }

  SYSTEM_REGIONS {
    int64 region_id "maps to station_information region_id"
    object name
  }
```
